_description: ‘Articuli fidei’, a portion of an abstract of Mirck’s Instructions (1581) — 36 couplets including 4-line introduction and 2-line conclusion

TCD211.First Lines:
Þe artyculus of þe faytech þi perichones þus
                    & seyþat seuen pertenet to þe godheddeand seuen to
                    þe manheddeþe forme artecle is þu vostleue on fader
                    & sonne & holy gost…
TCD211.Last Lines:
…here byn þe arteclus of þe fayþeche hem ofte I
                    þe pray
TCD211.Editions:
Bitterling,  Klaus. 
             “An Abstract of John Mirk’s Instructions for Parish
                Priests.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 24 [222] (1977): 146.
